name: yarn.nodemanager.runtime.linux.runc.image-tag-to-manifest-plugin.cache-refresh-interval-secs
explanation: This configuration option is related to the task speculation in YARN. The negative value might cause errors in the task speculation process.

name: dfs.image.parallel.threads
explanation: The number of threads for loading DFS images might affect the performance of the task. If the number is too low, it might cause the task to be speculated.

name: ipc.client.connect.retry.interval
explanation: The interval for retrying to establish a server connection might affect the task execution. If the interval is too short, it might cause the task to be speculated.
